mapper.insert: insert into product (sellerNum, cateNum, productName, content, price, imgUrl, status) values (#{sellerNum}, #{cateNum}, #{productName}, #{content}, #{price}, #{imgUrl}, #{status})
mapper.update: update product set cateNum=#{cateNum}, productName=#{productName}, content=#{content}, price=#{price}, imgUrl=#{imgUrl}, status=#{status} where productNum=#{productNum}
update product set status=#{status} where productNum=#{productNum}
mapper.insert: insert into productOption (productNum, `option`, price, stock) values (#{productNum}, #{option}, #{price}, #{stock})
mapper.update: update productOption set option=#{option}, price=#{price}, updatedAt=#{updatedAt}, stock=#{stock} where optionNum=#{optionNum}
update product set stock = #{stock} where productNum = #{productNum}

SELECT p.productNum, p.productName, p.price, p.imgUrl, p.salesVolume, s.storeName, IFNULL(ROUND(AVG(r.pdRating), 1), 0) AS avgRating, COUNT(r.reviewNum) AS reviewCount FROM product p JOIN sellerDetail s ON p.sellerNum = s.sellerNum LEFT JOIN prodreview r ON p.productNum = r.productNum WHERE p.cateNum = #{cateNum} GROUP BY p.productNum
ORDER BY p.createdAt DESC, p.productName ASC
ORDER BY p.price ASC, p.productName ASC
ORDER BY p.price DESC, p.productName ASC
ORDER BY p.productName DESC
LIMIT #{start}, #{pageSize}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM product WHERE cateNum = #{cateNum}
